alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; North Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 4:19PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Itasca and west central St. Louis Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 419 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Togo, or 28 miles north of Hibbing, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Locations impacted include... Togo, Perch Lake, Angora, Stony Brook, Shermans Corner, Side Lake, Snake Trail, and Mcarthy Beach State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
